title: 1.4. Step Documentation Guidelines
intro: Please refer to these simple guidelines when uploading your Documentation to your Template Steps. This will ensure that your media is presented well across all devices & platforms.

points.text: It is recommended to use an image minimum 610px width.
It is recommended to use an image maximum 920px width to keep file size small.
A maximum of 1000px height is recommended to accommodate portrait devices such as smartphones.
A file size around 150-200kb is realistic for these recommended sizes after optimization.
For best results use jpg imagery and optimize them if the file sizes are large.
Minimum of 160px by 160px and recommended to be a square aspect ratio but not required.
Make sure images are JPG or PNG ideally and are compressed using an image optimizer such as Kraken if the file is large.
When using a logo try to ensure the background is white.
A size between 15-20kb for the cover is realistic for these recommended sizes after optimization.

blocks.content: Apple Preview can easily crop or resize your images but avoid blowing up images already too small. Microsoft Paint or Photoshop are good alternatives on Windows.

points.text: Video files must be mp4 and less than 30MB.
For best results on multiple platforms make sure the video is 640 x 480 (480p). Anything larger does not make a difference on devices and can increase file sizes significantly.
A standard 4:3 aspect ratio is the best.

blocks.content: 1.4.2.2. Resizing and formatting video for use on FieldLogs.
Converting video files from multiple sizes and file types to these recommendation can be done using the open source tool Handbrake. It has preset called Universal to support a wide range of devices.
